channel.title: How can I make it so people get Agility Tickets after a turn of Course
channel.description:
I got Agility Course at Gnome and I want that after they did all the agility course, they get a Agility ticket. They need to do all of it to have one. I want it when they pass the last thing (the Pipe). Anyone know how ?
P.S THEY NEED TO DO ALL COURSE BEFORE THEIR AGILITY TICKET.
Thanks.

xaviergmail:

iim WORKING on it lols

Ok, do your best, thanks.

item.title: How can I make it so people get Agility Tickets after a turn of Course
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:17, topic:296658”][quote author=Maximum ZxZ link=topic=392643.msg2923503#msg2923503 date=1250885236]

well yaeh i know how to make the pipe give the item but the only way would is you have to add the walls to make it a route

But if I make walls or objects, people will glitch and pass through them…
[/quote]

Make it like 317 assault areas.

“You cannot follow in assault.”

Just get the code and change assault to “You cannot follow in the Gnome Agility Course.”

Try and make it not-spam. ^^"[/quote]

I don’t have the follow thing for Assault. :S I really need it please.

Read full topic

well yaeh i know how to make the pipe give the item but the only way would is you have to add the walls to make it a route
[/quote]

But if I make walls or objects, people will glitch and pass through them…[/quote]

“You cannot follow in assault.”

Just get the code and change assault to “You cannot follow in the Gnome Agility Course.”

Try and make it not-spam. ^^"

item.title: How can I make it so people get Agility Tickets after a turn of Course
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:4, topic:296658”]Seems a lot but:

Pillar of Light | ID: 9981

Place one on each tile you want them to not go through.
There’s better objects that take up more than 1 space, but Idk how to turn them around and whatnot.[/quote]

Yeah, so they don’t glitch through walls and cheat with Agility tickets. You got another object that takes more than 1 space ?

Read full topic

item.title: How can I make it so people get Agility Tickets after a turn of Course
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:2, topic:296658”]You could place obstacles around everything so they HAVE to do the course in order to get to the pipe.
Then after they do the pipe, have a portal for them to go back to the log, or something.[/quote]

OMG good idea. But how can I make it like I want ? Because it will be long to add objects all around the arena.
